title: Five-Year Prison Sentence for Man who Stole 120,000 Bitcoin from Bitfinex in 2016
description:
More than 120,000 bitcoin were stolen in a 2016 breach of Bitfinex. Seven years later the perpetrator pleaded guilty. 

And Thursday he was sentenced to a five-year prison term, reports the Associated Press:

Ilya Lichtenstein masterminded one of the largest-…

title: Bitcoin nears $100,000 as investors bet on crypto-friendly Trump policies

content: economycryptobitcoin nears 100,000 investor bet crypto-friendly trump policiesworlds popular digital currency rise high 99,073 expectation trump ease legal regulatory hurdles.an employee watch electronic signboard displaying price bitcoin cryptocurrencies lounge bithumb cryptocurrency exchange seoul , south korea , november 21 , 2024 ahn young-joonap photopublished 22 nov 202422 nov 2024bitcoin nearing 100,000 mark crypto enthusiast bet united state president-elect donald trump usher welcoming regulatory environment digital asset . world popular digital currency rose high 99,073 thursday , extending surge since trump re-election november 5. commodity risen 60 percent since election day investor anticipate trump incoming administration ease regulatory legal hurdle use . trump , called asset scam first term , accepted campaign donation cryptocurrency , pledged make u crypto capital planet accumulate national bitcoin reserve . trump three son september also announced launch crypto business , world liberty financial , investor taken promising sign president-elects belief sector . another bullish signal sector thursday , united state security exchange commission sec chair , gary gensler , widely disliked among crypto investor aggressive enforcement action targeting sector , confirmed would step january . advertisement trump pledged fire gensler day one administration , though president authority remove sec chair end term . viewed supporter ticket big return financial freedom , bitcoin cryptocurrencies known volatility faced government crackdown several part world . climbing record high 69,000 late 2021 , bitcoin plunged less 16,000 following year . commodity burst past previous peak march gaining 300 percent since november 2022. source al jazeera news agency

title: What Math Problems Do Bitcoin Miners Really Solve
description: What math Bitcoin mining actually requires and why complex mathematical skills aren't needed to understand or participate in mining
content: homeweb3 communitybetanewscrypto pricesnft priceslearnmoreedit storyforbesforbes digital assetswhat math problem bitcoin miner really solveandrey sergeenkovcontributoropinions expressed forbes contributor own.andrey sergeenkov freelance crypto journalistfollowingdec 5 , 2024,0258am estupdated dec 5 , 2024 , 0301am estshare facebookshare twittershare linkedinbitcoin mining need computational power rather advanced math skills.getty bitcoin miner dont solve complex math problem - guess number . solving mathematical puzzle become common description bitcoin mining , process closely resembles massive digital lottery miner race generate random number find one fit specific criterion . importantly , there way calculate correct number directly - miner try different number find one work , reverse calculation impossible design . key difference lie computation versus calculation . math problem like calculus requires step-by-step problem solving . mining like trying flip coin get head 10,000 time row - sound impossible human , modern mining machine make trillion attempt per second find right combination . one computer cant solve puzzle better another - make guess faster . even mine bitcoin pencil paper manually calculating sha-256 hash . single computation would take many hour , making impractical proving mining requires advanced math - title: Bitcoin Shakes Off Microsoft Snub; Crypto Blasts Tech Titan's History Of Missing Out
description: Microsoft shareholders rejected a proposal to invest in Bitcoin, and while $BTC may have been affected shortly after the news, it has since moved on and is once again on a steady climb.
content: marvie basilan marvbuzzilan published 121124 334 est share facebook share twitter share linkedin share reddit share flipboard share pocket london , england - january 09 photo illustration , visual representation digital cryptocurrency , bitcoin seen january 09 , 2024 london , england . dan kitwoodgetty image key pointsbtc plunged 94,000 earlier tuesday climbed 97,000 high within hourscrypto user criticized microsoft track record missing tech wavesmicrosoft missed search engine wave , well smartphone frenzythe cryptocurrency community wasnt surprised microsoft shareholder title: MicroStrategy and Bitcoin: A Perpetual Machine or a House of Cards?

content: microstrategy bitcoin perpetual machine house card ? siamak masnavi 14 dec 2024 bitcoin btc microstrategy nasdaq mstr , business intelligence company founded 1985 , made bold move august 2020 adopting bitcoin primary treasury reserve asset . decision marked significant shift company , transforming quasi-bitcoin investment vehicle . however , question remains bitcoin-centric strategy sustained indefinitely , high-risk gamble ? microstrategys bitcoin strategy accumulate , accumulate , accumulate initially investing 250 million bitcoin , microstrategy consistently pursued strategy accumulating bitcoin whenever possible . isnt simply passive holding strategy active pursuit fueled two primary method raising capital at-the-market atm offering involves selling share microstrategy stock directly market . generates fund bitcoin purchase , also dilutes value existing share , effectively spreading ownership across larger pool shareholders.convertible note offering microstrategy also raise capital issuing convertible note , form debt converted equity share later date . initially , note offered small interest payment , company since moved offering 0 interest note , making attractive option investor seeking exposure bitcoin . strategy created positive feedback loop price bitcoin rise , microstrategys stock price tends follow , often amplified gain . increased stock price make easier company raise capital atm offering convertible note , used purchase even bitcoin , driving price . creates seemingly perpetual machine bitcoin purchase fuel stock appreciation , turn facilitates bitcoin purchase . dynamic strengthened december 13 , 2024 , nasdaq announced microstrategy would added prestigious nasdaq-100 index , effective december 23 , 2024. inclusion expected bring even greater visibility liquidity mstr stock , attracting institutional investor potentially making even easier company raise capital future bitcoin acquisition . risk concern house built bitcoin ? title: Early-Era US Bitcoin Investor Sentenced to Two Years in Prison for Underreporting Gains From BTC Sales
description: An ancient Bitcoin investor is going to spend the next two years in prison after underreporting his BTC gains, according to the U.S. Department of Justice (DOJ). In a new press release, the DOJ says that Frank Richard Ahlgren III of Austin, Texas failed to ac…

title: Crypto Market Predicted To Surge To All-Time Highs By Late 2025, But A 30% Drop In Bitcoin Prices Could Come First
description: Asset manager VanEck has projected a significant upswing in the cryptocurrency market, anticipating record highs by the end of 2025. This prediction outlines expectations for Bitcoin BTC/USD to reach approximately $180,000 and Ethereum ETH/USD to exceed $6,00…
